channel.title: drought resistance on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in drought resistance on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaCIPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA01g29520 Gene Symbol: CaCIPK3 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 3 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The CaCIPK3 gene positively regulates drought tolerance in pepper.

item.title: CaPMEI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaPMEI1 Gene Name: pectin methlyesterase inhibitor protein 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Pepper pectin methylesterase inhibitor protein CaPMEI1 is required for antifungal activity, basal disease resistance and abiotic stress tolerance.

item.title: CmNF-YB8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: UN088090 Gene Symbol: CmNF-YB8 Gene Name: Genome: Chrysanthemum genome v2.

item.title: CsCER1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa6G079750 Gene Symbol: CsCER1 Gene Name: ECERIFERUM1 Genome: Cucurbit Genomics Database Species: Camelina sativa Functional Descriptions: We identified 67 GT development–related genes, the functions of 7 of which were validated by virus-induced gene silencing.

item.title: DROT1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os10g35460 RAPdb gene ID: Os10g0497700 Gene Symbol: DROT1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g39780 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0473850 Gene Symbol: DWA1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GF14b;OsGF14b
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os04g38870 RAPdb gene ID: Os04g0462500 Gene Symbol: GF14b OsGF14b Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GhCAS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCAS Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Genome Database Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCAS, GhAPX, GhSDH, and GhPOD, were cloned from cotton complementary DNA, and their expression patterns under stress were analyzed.

item.title: GhCKX14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D01G1177 Gene Symbol: GhCKX14 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCKX14 responding to drought stress by modulating antioxi-dative enzyme activity in Gossypium hirsutum compared to CKX family genes.

item.title: Ghd2;OsK
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g49880 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0731700 Gene Symbol: Ghd2 OsK Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GhMKK5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMKK5 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase5 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhMKK5 affects disease resistance, induces HR-like cell death, and reduces the tolerance to salt and drought stress in transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana.

item.title: GhMYB36
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMYB36 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The GhMYB36 transcription factor confers resistance to biotic and abiotic stress by enhancing PR1 gene expression in plants.

item.title: GhNAC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D01G0636 Gene Symbol: GhNAC4 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor 4 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhNAC4 promotes drought tolerance by regulating secondary cell wall biosynthesis and ribosomal protein homeostasis.

item.title: GhZFP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhZFP1 Gene Name: CCCH-type zinc finger protein 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhZFP1, a novel CCCH-type zinc finger protein from cotton, enhances salt stress tolerance and fungal disease resistance in transgenic tobacco by interacting with GZIRD21A and GZIPR5.

item.title: GmDRF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G085900 Gene Symbol: GmDRF1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmDRF1/2 physically bind to the promoter of GmPrx16 and promote its expression, and drought stress induces the expression of GmDRF1/2, thereby influencing the accumulation of ROS and multiple stress response pathways.

item.title: GmDRF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.07G171200 Gene Symbol: GmDRF2 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmDRF1/2 physically bind to the promoter of GmPrx16 and promote its expression, and drought stress induces the expression of GmDRF1/2, thereby influencing the accumulation of ROS and multiple stress response pathways.

item.title: GmERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmERF3 Gene Name: EREBP/AP2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the soybean GmERF3 gene, an AP2/ERF type transcription factor for increased tolerances to salt, drought, and diseases in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: GmFNSII-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmFNSII-2 Gene Name: Glycine max flavone synthase II Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmFNSII-2C could be used for molecular breeding of drought-tolerant soybean.

item.title: GmMYB84
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.05G234600 Gene Symbol: GmMYB84 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB Transcription Factor 84 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Drought Tolerance Conferred in Soybean (Glycine max.

item.title: GmNFYA5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.07g036200 Gene Symbol: GmNFYA5 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Our results suggested that overexpression of GmNFYA5 improved drought tolerance in soybean via both ABA-dependent and ABA-independent pathways.

item.title: GmNTF2B-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.08G105100 Gene Symbol: GmNTF2B-1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Nuclear transport factor GmNTF2B-1 enhances soybean drought tolerance by interacting with oxidoreductase GmOXR17 to reduce reactive oxygen species content.

item.title: GmSAP5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmSAP5 Gene Name: Stress-associated proteins Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmSAP5, a soybean A20/AN1 domain-containing stress-associated protein gene activated by GmAREB3, increases drought stress resistance in soybean by mediating ABA signaling.

item.title: LPA1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g13400 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0237250 Gene Symbol: LPA1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: MdABI5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD14G1021600 Gene Symbol: MdABI5 Gene Name: Malus domestica ABSCISIC ACID-INSENSITIVE 5 Genome: Malus × domestica GDDH13 v1.

item.title: MdDOF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD06G1194500 Gene Symbol: MdDOF3 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Glucose uptake from the rhizosphere mediated by MdDOF3-MdHT1.

item.title: MdDof54
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000308863 Gene Symbol: MdDof54 Gene Name: DNA-binding one zinc-finger 5 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The apple DNA-binding one zinc-finger protein MdDof54 promotes drought resistance.

item.title: MdGH3-12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD15G1290900 Gene Symbol: MdGH3-12 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdGH3-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD02G1180300 Gene Symbol: MdGH3-2 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdHDA6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdHDA6 Gene Name: HISTONE DEACETYLASE 6 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: histone deacetylase 6 (MdHDA6), which negatively regulates apple drought tolerance by catalyzing deacetylation on histones associated with drought-responsive genes.

item.title: MdHDA6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdHDA6 Gene Name: Malus domestica histone deacetylase 6 Genome: M.

item.title: MdHYL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdHYL1 Gene Name: HYPONASTIC LEAVES1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The RNA-binding protein MdHYL1 modulates cold tolerance and disease resistance in apple.

item.title: MdMYB124
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB124 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The regulatory module MdBT2–MdMYB88/MdMYB124–MdNRTs regulates nitrogen usage in apple.

item.title: MdMYB88
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdMYB88 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The regulatory module MdBT2–MdMYB88/MdMYB124–MdNRTs regulates nitrogen usage in apple.

item.title: MdSAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSAT1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple MdSAT1 encodes a bHLHm1 transcription factor involved in salinity and drought responses.

item.title: MdSE
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdSE Gene Name: SERRATE Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdSE acts as a negative regulator of apple (Malus × domestica) drought resistance by regulating the expression levels of MdMYB88 and MdMYB124 and miRNAs, including mdm-miR156, mdm-miR166, mdm-miR172, mdm-miR319, and mdm-miR399.

item.title: MdSHINE2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000178263 Gene Symbol: MdSHINE2 Gene Name: AP2/EREBP transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Apple AP2/EREBP transcription factor MdSHINE2 confers drought resistance by regulating wax biosynthesis.

item.title: MeCAD15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeCAD15 Gene Name: cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase 15 Genome: cassava database of Phytozome v10.

item.title: MeCatalase1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.05G130500 Gene Symbol: MeCatalase1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The chaperone MeHSP90 recruits MeWRKY20 and MeCatalase1 to regulate drought stress resistance in cassava.

item.title: MePOD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MePOD Gene Name: Genome: cassava database of Phytozome v10.

item.title: MeRAV5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.06G036900 Gene Symbol: MeRAV5 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The dual interplay of RAV5 (MeRAV5) in activating nitrate reductases and repressing catalase activity to improve disease resistance in cassava.

item.title: MeWRKY20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.15G118300 Gene Symbol: MeWRKY20 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The chaperone MeHSP90 recruits MeWRKY20 and MeCatalase1 to regulate drought stress resistance in cassava.

item.title: PacCYP707A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PacCYP707A1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus avium Functional Descriptions: PacCYP707A2 negatively regulates cherry fruit ripening while PacCYP707A1 mediates drought tolerance.

item.title: PoWRKY71
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene0031821 Gene Symbol: PoWRKY71 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 71 Genome: Species: Paeonia ostii Functional Descriptions: PoWRKY71 is involved in Paeonia ostii resistance to drought stress by directly regulating light-harvesting chlorophyll a/b-binding 151 gene.

item.title: PtoMYB142
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtoMYB142 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor PtoMYB142 enhances drought tolerance in Populus tomentosa by regulating gibberellin catabolism.

item.title: SGI
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA10g00180D Gene Symbol: SGI Gene Name: Stress and Growth Interconnector Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Herein, we report a previously uncharacterized, dicotyledon-specific gene, Stress and Growth Interconnector (SGI), that promotes growth during drought in the oil crop rapeseed (Brassica napus) and the model plant Arabidopsis (Arabidopsis thaliana).

item.title: SlBRI1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlBRI1 Gene Name: BRASSINOSTEROID INSENSITIVE 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of SlBRI1 driven by the Atrd29A promoter could increase the cold resistance of tomato plants during chilling stress but did not improve the expression of SlBRI1 and plant growth under normal conditions.

item.title: SlGT30
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc11g005380 Gene Symbol: SlGT30 Gene Name: trihelix transcription factor GT-2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: CRISPR/Cas9 edited SlGT30 improved both drought resistance and fruit yield through endoreduplication.
